BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 1200Z TO 1400Z AND
   1600Z TO 1800Z DAILY 10 THRU 15 NOV
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   29-20.88S 049-05.88W, 29-27.05S 049-32.05W,
   30-38.03S 050-09.87W, 31-06.87S 050-29.88W,
   31-24.05S 050-19.88W.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 151900Z NOV 14.
